name: liquid-liberty-subquery
description: Subgraph for fetching OHLCV data for TradingView price charts

scripts.build: echo 'âŒ ERROR: Use specific build commands to prevent environment mistakes!' && echo 'Use: npm run build:sepolia, npm run build:pulse, or npm run build:local' && exit 1
scripts.build:sepolia: echo 'ðŸ” Building for SEPOLIA network...' && npm run clean && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia subql build && mv project.yaml project-sepolia.yaml && node verify-build.js sepolia
scripts.build:pulse: echo 'ðŸ” Building for PULSE network...' && npm run clean && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse subql build && mv project.yaml project-pulse.yaml && node verify-build.js pulse
scripts.build:local: echo 'ðŸ” Building for LOCAL network...' && npm run clean && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local subql build && mv project.yaml project-local.yaml && node verify-build.js local
scripts.build:multichain: npm run build:sepolia && npm run build:pulse && (echo specVersion: 1.0.0> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo version: 0.0.5>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo query:>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo   name: '@subql/query'>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo   version: '*'>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo.>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo projects:>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo   - project-sepolia.yaml>> subquery-multichain.yaml && echo   - project-pulse.yaml>> subquery-multichain.yaml)
scripts.dev:docker: npm run build && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop npm run codegen && subql build
